a1: Yes! Use the 'PDF to Images' tab to extract pages as images, or the 'Images to PDF' tab to combine multiple images into a single PDF document.
a2: For PDF to Images: JPG and PNG output. For Images to PDF: JPG, PNG, and WebP input. You can mix different image formats when creating a PDF.
a3: All processing happens in your browser. Your files never leave your device â€” nothing is uploaded to any server.
